passed_checks.check_name: Ensure all data stored in RDS is not publicly accessible
code_block:
resource "aws_db_instance" "good_rds" {
  identifier                 = "jj-good-rds"
  engine                     = "mysql"
  instance_class             = "db.t3.micro"
  username                   = "admin"
  password                   = "UseSecretManagerOrIAM!"
  allocated_storage          = 20
  publicly_accessible        = false
  storage_encrypted          = true
  backup_retention_period    = 7
  iam_database_authentication_enabled = true
  skip_final_snapshot        = true
}

url: Add an api key '--bc-api-key <api-key>' to see more detailed insights via https://bridgecrew.cloud

passed_checks.check_name: Ensure the S3 bucket does not allow WRITE permissions to everyone
code_block:
LogBucket:
    Type: AWS::S3::Bucket
    Properties:
      BucketName: jj-secure-logs
      OwnershipControls:
        Rules:
          - ObjectOwnership: BucketOwnerEnforced
      PublicAccessBlockConfiguration:
        BlockPublicAcls: true
        BlockPublicPolicy: true
        IgnorePublicAcls: true
        RestrictPublicBuckets: true
      BucketEncryption:
        ServerSideEncryptionConfiguration:
          - ServerSideEncryptionByDefault:
              SSEAlgorithm: AES256
